P1.TITLE: Angular - Internal chat
P1.DESCRIPTION: I worked in a team to create an internal communication platform, which included a real-time chat system that connected dispatchers with truck drivers to improve coordination and operational efficiency.

P2.TITLE: React - Ticketing application
P2.DESCRIPTION: Developed a ticket purchasing system enabling the acquisition of tickets for exclusive events. To ensure security and transaction uniqueness, I implemented a system of unique identifiers. Additionally, I designed a tracking feature that effectively logged all tickets sold, providing detailed control and analysis of sales.
